Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2007 11:07PM ddd wrote: Jackie, Bilateral mastectomy is not too drastic of a measure, especially if: 1) you expect to live at least another 30 years 2) the cancer is Stage 0 (meaning no additional toxic treatments are needed) 3) you don't want to give cancer a second chance (your best shot is the first shot) If you are comfortable with bilateral mastectomy, don't let anyone(not even a doctor) talk you out of it.  It is your decision and you alone will make the right decision for you.
